About Me
About Me

A self-taught Web Developer with keen interest in Linux and Computer Networking. An avid reader of Historical, Mythological and Concpiracy Books. Love to explore practical applications of Computer Science and how it can be simplified for public use. I believe today's technology can change lives but only with the development of a product that has the potential to reach the masses can we do so.

The art of Learning is in itself a challenging task. The best way to learn is to teach it to someone else. That's what I love the most. Thinking about the concept from different angles and delivering it. Learning By Teaching.

Never said "NO" to new experiences. Be it hackathons or trying out a new cusine. I am always up for a new assignment or an unplanned trip.
